resources.string:
"Khumbula:
"
"Ukufanisa kobuso kuphephe kancane kunephethini, iphinikhodi, noma iphasiwedi
"
Omunye ofana nawe angakwazi ukuvula ithebhuleti yakho"
"
Idatha esetshenziselwa ukubona ubuso bakho igcinwa iyimfihlo kuthebhulethi yakho

" "
"Thola indawo endlini engakhanyi kakhulu noma emnyama kakhulu
"
Bamba ithebhulethi kuleveli yeso
Ukuze uvule ithebulethi yakho, vele uvule isikrini sakho uphinde ubheke ikhamera
Ithebulethi yakho izovula ngemuva nje kokuthi ikubone

"Izibonelo:
"
"Emkhanyweni owehlukile
"
Ngezibuko ezichaziwe noma ngaphandle kwazo"
"
Ngentshebe noma okusheviwe"
"" Beka ithebhulethi kuleveli yeso"
